# Interactive component


 下拉: connector type geomap/ zip geomap
 倒数第二个video recording
 
 
 <script src="https://d3js.org/d3.v6.js"></script>
 
 <div id="plot"></div> 
 
 <script>
 // Create SVG element
    var svg = d3.select("div#plot") 
        .append("svg")
        .attr("width", "10000")
        .attr("height", "25000");
        
 // Add elements

        
        // divided by 100 times
   var bardata = [1.61, 34.57, 45.32, 46.44, 37.45, 65.02, 119.98, 172.06, 123.43];
   var textdata = [161, 3457, 4532, 4644, 3745, 6502, 11998, 17206, 12343];

   var bars = svg.selectAll("rect")
      .data(bardata);

   bars.enter()
      .append("rect")
        .attr("x", (d, i) => i*55)
        .attr("y", d => 400 - d)
        .attr("width", "35")
        .attr("height",d => d)
        .attr("fill", "blue");    
        
   svg.selectAll("text")
      .data(textdata)
      .enter()
      .append("text")
      .attr("x", (d, i) => i*55+20)
      .attr("y", d => 380-(d/100))
      .text(d => d)
      .attr("fill", "blue")
      .attr("text-anchor", "middle");
        
        
        
 </script>
